content: cowboy frog tapestry by moththem stitching instagram @moththemstitching ravelry moththem email moththemstitching@gmail com do not copy sell or share this pattern you can sell the tapestries made with this pattern if you give credit to moththem stitching when i started this pattern i was inspired by a pixel image of a frog from pinterest these are going to be free because of this i have edited the original pixel pattern to be tapestry crocheted and each new hat is of my own design requirements 3 25mm hook worst weight yarn in light green dark green light brown dark brown background colour ¼ dowel 20 or 51cm scissors and needle tips+ tricks if you are having troubles crocheting into your starting chain or it is sinching in the bottom of your tapestry i recommend sizing up your hook for the chains only if you want to weave in your ends as you go there are lots of techniques but my personal favorite for wall tapestries is to stitch over your tails for 3 stitches after starting or finishing a colour sometimes you can be starting or stopping several colours in the same area and i will either carry the colour to the row above or a few stiches over i find that stitching over more then one tail at a time causes too much bulk to avoid lots of mess and caried yarn in the back i like to start a new strand for each colour in an area i also will catch a caried thread ever 3-4 stitches if i do decide to carry it i work my tapestries in half double crochets when switching colours the stitch before will be stitched as follows with colour 1 yarn over insert hook yarn over pull through drop yarn tail to back side pick up colour 2 pull through all three loops abbreviations chain chain r-l right to left when reading the chart single_crochet single_crochet l-r left to right when reading the chart half_double_crochet half_double_crochet cowboy frog 32x32 we will be working bottom to top and left to right from the front right to left from the back the background colour is represented by off- white so that the chart is easier to read starting with background colour chain 33 half_double_crochet into 3rd chain from hook or chain 31 half_double_crochet 32 total last 2 chain are first half_double_crochet flip work this is the first row row 2 r-l in background colour chain 2 first half_double_crochet 3hdc 4hdc in dark green 1hdc in background 4hdc in dark green 6hdc in background 4hdc in dark green 1hdc in background 4hdc in dark green 4hdc in background flip project row 3 l-r chain 2 first half_double_crochet 2hdc in background 1hdc in dark green 3hdc in light green 3hdc in dark green 2hdc in light green 8hdc in dark green 2hdc in light green 3hdc in dark green 2hdc in light green 2hdc in dark green 3hdc in background flip row 4-32 continue back and forth
